remarks: If the result of a multiplication is strictly negative, then multiplicands are of different signs.  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 19-Sep-2018.)
statement:
mul2lt0.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. RR ) $.
mul2lt0.2 $e |- ( ph -> B e. RR ) $.
mul2lt0.3 $e |- ( ph -> ( A x. B ) < 0 ) $.
mul2lt0llt0 $p |- ( ( ph /\ A < 0 ) -> 0 < B ) $.
